MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G71 postcode area of Bothwell, affecting properties in Mill Road and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:20pm due to a fault on our underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:27pm on Friday, 23 October 2020
